title: Codec Pack all-in-one [dazz1] [h33t]
description:
All Codec files you need as all in one setup


Codecs 6.0.3.0 all in 1
--------------------

Description
===========
This file is a setup for the installation of many necessary codecs for your daily video needs. This might not be actually necessary to most of today's computers, but if your computer is not able to play some video formats like mpeg, then you need this.

A codec is a set of instructions or .... signatures that lets a system recognise the audio or video file formats that are available. It is short-hand for Coder-Decoder. It allows the system to recognise the video file and decode the information so that it can be played.

Codec Pack All in 1 6.0.3.0 includes
------------------------------------
- DivX 6.1.1
- XviD Codec 1.1
- DivX, XviD - FFDShow 17.02.2005 Alpha
- MPEG2 2.0.0.0
- Subtitles G400 2.83
- Subtitles DVobSub (Win9x, Win2k and WinXP) 2.23, 2.33
- OGG Vorbis 0.9.9.5
- AC3 1.01a RC5
- Morgan Multimedia Stream Switcher 0.99


Instructions
============
1. Install the setup file and follow the installation wizard.

INFO - You may need to uninstall if any older codec packs are installed on your system and do not bother to install this if you have any newer packs already. I think this is one of the latest verions.

Enjoy. Pls seed. Encourage filesharing.
